item.title: Jaime add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Hello babies. Welcome to Earth. It's hot in the summer and cold in the winter. It's round and wet and crowded. On the outside, babies, you've got a hundred years here. There's only one rule that I know of, babies-"God damn it, you've got to be kind." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi
item.description: "Control of consciousness determines the quality of life." -- Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Anne Lamott
item.description: "Clutter and mess show us that life is being lived...Tidiness makes me think of held breath, of suspended animation... Perfectionism is a mean, frozen form of idealism, while messes are the artist's true friend. What people somehow forgot to mention when we were children was that we need to make messes in order to find out who we are and why we are here." -- Anne Lamott

item.title: Jaime add a quote by Anne Lamott
item.description: "If you want to make God laugh, tell her your plans." -- Anne Lamott
